Title: Hubert
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), David Renaud, Karen Struck (executive story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (story editor), Mark Rozeman (staff writer), Brian Shin (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Tamlyn Tomita
Plot: Shaun and Morgan try to treat a man with the help of his brother. Claire asks Dr Melendez for help to treat her friend who's dying from cancer. Dr Glassman continues on his road to recovery.
